testcase.name: Registration for Gillette
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Gillette homepage..........................................passed And Gillette title is displayed on the screen...............................passed When user clicked on Register link..........................................passed Then user fill "Prashant" and "Goel" and "abc123@gmail.com" and "abc123@1" and "abc123@1" details.passed And user select the "06" and "1990" DOB and "122001"........................passed Then user clicked on create your profile button.............................passed

testcase.system-out: Given user is on Gillette homepage Login....................................passed And Gillette title is displayed on the screen Login.........................passed When user clicked on Signin link............................................passed And user clicks on forgot password link.....................................passed Then user enters "abc123@gmail.com".........................................passed And user clicked on create new password button..............................passed
